snippet: The Jets on Tuesday signed wide receiver Jason Hill to replace the injured Santonio Holmes, who is out for the season.
abstract: New York Jets sign free-agent wide receiver Jason Hill to replace the injured Santonio Holmes, who is out for the season.
lead_paragraph: The Jets on Tuesday signed wide receiver Jason Hill to replace the injured Santonio Holmes, who is out for the season.

headline.seo: Jets Sign Jason Hill, a Receiver, as Names and Faces Keep Changing
headline.main: Jets Sign a Wide Receiver as the Names on Their Roster Keep Changing
headline.print_headline: Jets Sign a Wide Receiver as the Names on Their Roster Keep Changing
